document_data.name: Kreane
document_data.mainbody: '''Kreane''' was a palace servant in [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He had trysts with the [[War Wizard]] [[Raereene]].
document_data.History:
At the time when [[Alusair Obarskyr]] was helping [[Elminster]] sneak around [[Castle Obarskyr]] right around the time his body was destroyed in the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the two of them briefly observed Kreane and Raereene having an amorous encounter in the [[Room of the Fire Wyrm]].

Kreane was also accompanying Raereene when Alusair later sought her out to ask the War Wizard to teleport [[Elminster]] to [[Stormserpent Towers]], though he didn't get to do much at the time.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|370|35}}
